Header: Jakarta bans bikes from busy new road over selfie risk
Content: Jakarta's administrators have banned motorbikes from a new overpass that opened in the city this weekend, over fears that its potential popularity as a spot for taking selfies could cause accidents. The Semanggi Interchange is named after a common plant which resembles a four-leaf clover and the roads it passes over are shaped the same way. They have also been lit with thousands of diodes that change colour every few seconds.
